channel.title: Some emote help please

item.title: Some emote help please
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

in actionbuttons.java search for the actionbutton id of the skillcape emote button.

then add:

if(playerEquipment[playerCape] == <dung cape id> then the emote , gfx etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Some emote help please
item.dc:creator: @ta1nt3d ta1nt3d
item.description:
@ta1nt3d wrote:

hi i added this into my server for the dung cape emote

public void dungemote(final Client c) { EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent(new Event() { int dungtime = 16; public void execute(EventContainer dung) { if (dungtime == 16) { c.gfx0(2442); c.startAnimation(13190); } if (dungtime == 15) { c.npcId2 = 11228; c.isNpc = true; c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; c.startAnimation(13192); } if (dungtime == 10) { c.npcId2 = 11227; c.isNpc = true; c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; c.startAnimation(13193); } if (dungtime == 6) { c.gfx0(2442); } if (dungtime == 5) { c.npcId2 = 11229; c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; c.startAnimation(13194); } if (dungtime == 0) { c.isNpc = false; c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } if (c == null || dungtime <= 0) { dung.stop(); return; } if (dungtime >= 0) { dungtime--; } } }, 600); }

no compile erros i just dont know how to add it to the dung capes to make it work when you click the skillcape button

help is much appreciated.

Read full topic
